meanings.definition: To relax or unwind in a calm and laid-back manner.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I enjoy chillaxing on the couch with a good book.
meanings.sent2: She was chillaxing by the pool, soaking up the sun.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to be chillaxing more than me today, lounging around without a care in the world.
meanings.sent4: As the waves gently lapped the shore, I felt like I was chillaxing in paradise.
meanings.sent5: Chillaxing under the stars, I felt all my worries melt away into the night.

meanings.definition: The act of chilling out and relaxing.
meanings.sent1: His favorite chillaxing spot is the hammock in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: We planned a whole day of chillaxing at the spa for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The chillaxing session turned into a lively debate about the best way to relax.
meanings.sent4: The cozy cabin by the lake was the perfect place for some chillaxing.
meanings.sent5: The gentle music in the background added to the chillaxing atmosphere of the room.
